ValidationRule.description: Validates that the Fax field contains only valid phone number characters (digits, spaces, hyphens, parentheses, plus sign) and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Fax)), OR( LEN(Fax) < 7, LEN(Fax) > 40, NOT(REGEX(Fax, "^[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\+\\.]+$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fax number must be between 7 and 40 characters and contain only digits, spaces, hyphens, parentheses, plus signs, or periods.
